summary: This module provides core utility methods for the Simple MPM (Multi-Processing Module) in Apache HTTP Server. It initializes and manages the global MPM data structure including process and thread management configurations, and maintains timing and synchronization mechanisms.

logs.reason: Logs a critical error when the mutex creation fails during initialization. This mutex is critical for thread synchronization in the Simple MPM implementation.
logs.resolution: This error typically occurs due to system resource limitations. Check system limits for maximum number of mutexes, available memory, and user permissions. Restart the server or increase system resources if this error persists.
